effect_entries.effect:
When taken to the pewter city museum, causes latias or latios to attack the trainer.

The Pokémon to appear will be whicher can’t be encountered roaming in the wild.
effect_entries.short_effect: S: Summons Latias H: Summons Latios.

flavor_text_entries.text: A crystal ball that was excavated from the ground. It’s a very beautiful stone that is covered with bits of rock and earth.
